name: BASE44 2.0
description: Base44 is the only all-in-one platform that empowers anyone to create software. From tools and personal apps - to complete online businesses—without writing a single line of code (unless you want to 😉).
label: The all-in-one app building platform. No integrations needed
label_zh: 一站式应用构建平台。无需集成
content_zh: BASE44 2.0 是一个全能平台，让任何人都能轻松创建软件。无论是工具、个人应用，还是完整的在线业务，都可以在不需要编写任何代码的情况下完成（当然，如果你想写代码也可以）。

name: LiftmyCV
description:
Tired of filling out the same job application forms over and over?
Exhausted from browsing dozens of job search websites?

I've got you covered! Meet LiftmyCV – an AI agent that finds job openings and auto-applies on your behalf. No subscription required.
label: AI agent that finds jobs and auto-applies on your behalf
label_zh:
AI助手，帮您找 job 并自动申请

---

AI助手，帮您找工作并自动申请
content_zh:
厌倦了一次又一次填写相同的求职申请表？
浏览了无数的招聘网站，感到疲惫不堪？

别担心！来认识一下LiftmyCV——一个能帮你找到职位并自动申请的人工智能助手。无需订阅。

name: Lamatic 2.0
description: A fully managed PaaS with Agent IDE, integrated vector stores, and seamless connections to apps, data sources, and leading AI models — empowering you to rapidly build, test, and deploy high-performance AI Agents at the Serverless Edge.
label: IDE to build & deploy AI agents on serverless
label_zh: IDE 用于在无服务器上构建和部署 AI 代理
content_zh: 一个全托管的PaaS平台，提供Agent IDE、集成向量存储，并能无缝连接到应用程序、数据源和领先的人工智能模型——帮助你快速构建、测试和部署高性能的AI代理，在无服务器边缘运行。

name: ARize – Shop Anything in AR
description: Revolutionizing online shopping with AR. Turn ANY product image from ANY online store into a 3D model & see it in AR in your space before buying. Works with Amazon, eBay, AliExpress, and more. No more guessing, no more surprises - just smarter shopping in AR.
label: View Any Product in AR from Any Site or Marketplace
label_zh: 查看来自任何网站或市场的任意产品AR效果
content_zh: ARize – Shop Anything in AR 正在革新在线购物体验。它可以把任何网店的任意商品图片转换成3D模型，并让你在购买前通过增强现实技术在自己的空间里预览。支持亚马逊、eBay、速卖通等多家电商平台。不再凭空猜测，不再有意外惊喜，只需更智能的AR购物体验。

name: Flexpoint
description: Flexpoint is the all-in-one platform for creators to sell coaching calls, digital products, services, and more — all under their own brand. Ditch the tool overload and run your business from one beautiful, Stripe-powered storefront.
label: A single storefront for creators to sell anything
label_zh: 一个供创作者销售任何商品的统一店面
content_zh: Flexpoint 是一个全能平台，创作者可以在这里销售辅导电话、数字产品、服务等，全部以自己的品牌进行。告别繁琐的工具堆砌，通过这个美观且由 Stripe 支持的店面来管理你的业务。

name: TikTok Super Tool
description: The most comprehensive TikTok profile analysis tool. Get deep insights, download videos, analyze hashtags, and access sounds. Perfect for creators and marketers.
label: Get insights and analytics for any Tiktok profile
label_zh: 获取任何TikTok账号的洞察和分析数据
content_zh: 最全面的TikTok个人资料分析工具。获取深度洞察，下载视频，分析标签和音乐。非常适合内容创作者和营销人员使用。

name: Krea Video Training
description: Krea Video Training is the fine-tune Krea's AI video model with your own images/videos to create custom styles, motions, and objects. Control the AI, don't just prompt it!
label: Train AI to create videos in your style
label_zh: 训练AI以你的风格创作视频
content_zh: Krea Video Training 是一个工具，可以让你用自己的图片和视频来微调 Krea 的 AI 视频模型，从而创建自定义的风格、动作和对象。你可以控制 AI，而不仅仅是给它提示！

name: GPT Rules
description: GPT Rules brings Cursor-style rules to your browser, letting you create custom rules for consistent, high-quality AI responses every time.
label: Supercharge your AI chats with cursor style rules
label_zh:
直译：
用光标样式规则为您的AI聊天增压

意译：
用光标样式规则提升您的AI聊天体验
content_zh: GPT Rules 将类似 Cursor 的规则引入浏览器，让你可以创建自定义规则，从而每次都能获得一致且高质量的 AI 回答。

name: Searchbirds
description: Making a simpler search engine for people to use. It has a cute logo, and just an overall cozy feel. It gets updates almost daily as well.
label: A simpler, ad-free search engine
label_zh: 一个更简单、无广告的搜索引擎
content_zh: Searchbirds是一款简洁易用的搜索引擎，它有一个可爱的标志，整体给人一种温馨的感觉。此外，它几乎每天都会更新。

name: Bandera AI
description: Bandera AI transforms your sales process with intelligent lead generation and seamless automation, delivering qualified prospects directly to your inbox.
label: No More Manual Work. Just Sales
label_zh: 不再手动操作，只需专注销售
content_zh: Bandera AI 通过智能潜在客户生成和无缝自动化，直接将合格的潜在客户送到你的邮箱，从而优化你的销售流程。

name: intura
description: A platform that helps you compare, test, and optimize AI models, making it easier to select the best-performing and most cost-effective AI for their needs. This is our first launch and we would love to have your feedback on the beta! (we're all ears 🐰)
label: Compare, test, and optimize AI models
content_zh: 一个平台，帮助你比较、测试和优化AI模型，让你更容易选择性能最佳且最具成本效益的AI解决方案。这是我们首次发布，非常希望你能对测试版提供反馈！（我们洗耳恭听 🐰）

name: Pocketlink
description: A new and revolutionizing way to create a customizable link-in-bio page with Pocketlink. Monetize your audience, track analytics, and grow your online presence with our AI tools.
label: Reimagine your link-in-bio experience, powered by AI
label_zh: 重新构想您的个人链接体验，由AI驱动
content_zh: 使用Pocketlink创建一个可自定义的个人链接页面，这是一种全新的革命性方式。利用我们的AI工具，你可以将观众变现、跟踪分析数据并扩大你的在线影响力。

name: EOR Overview
description: Compare Employer of Record providers with verified data on pricing, features, and country coverage. Our platform is built on the principle that there's no universally "best" EOR provider – only the one that best fits your specific needs and requirements.
label: Find and compare 140+ Employer of Record (EOR) providers!
label_zh: 查找并比较140多家名义雇主（EOR）服务商！
content_zh: 比较不同雇主记录服务提供商，获取经过验证的价格、功能和国家覆盖范围数据。我们的平台基于一个原则：没有普遍意义上的“最佳”EOR提供商，只有最适合您特定需求和要求的服务商。

name: Interview Code Ace
description: The ultimate, invisible AI powered tool to help you succeed in technical interviews. Practice, prepare, and perform with confidence.
label: The ultimate, invisible AI powered tool for interviews
label_zh: 终极隐形的人工智能面试工具
topics_zh: 职业发展，软件工程，人工智能
content_zh: Interview Code Ace 是一款强大的隐形 AI 工具，帮助你在技术面试中取得成功。它能让你自信地练习、准备和表现。

name: Reelvis
description: Reelvis is an all-in-one tool for creating reels on social media. It generates video scripts, adds captions, and provides professional voiceovers-all in a few clicks. Automate video production and keep your audience engaged effortlessly!
label: Create reels for your brand on instagram, tiktok and youtube
label_zh: 为您的品牌在Instagram、TikTok和YouTube上创建短视频
content_zh: Reelvis 是一款全能工具，用于在社交媒体上制作短视频。它能生成视频脚本、添加字幕，并提供专业的配音，只需点击几下即可完成。使用 Reelvis 可以自动完成视频制作，轻松吸引观众的注意力！
